description: Values B(2,n)/4 of Gandhi polynomials defined by B(x,0)=x and B(x,n) = x^2 (B(x+1,n-1) - B(x,n-1)).
references: D. Dumont, Interpretations combinatoires des nombres de Genocchi, Duke Math. J., 41 (1974), 305-318.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms from Reiner Martin (reinermartin(AT)hotmail.com), Dec 20 2001
